name: LightsOut (SewerynKaminski)
description:
A puzzle game where You turns all lights out but it is not so easy. You can choose from many sizes 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7, 8x8, 9x9 boards. Every walk through is unique. Patterns are randomly generated and always have solution.

If You feel lost there is always HINT button!
